text: The 2018 Summer Youth Olympic Games, officially known as the III Olympic Youth Summer Games, is an international summer sports event. It was held from 6 to 18 October 2018. The host city is Buenos Aires, Argentina. Olympics Category:October 2018 events Category:Summer Youth Olympic Games Category:Sport in Argentina Category:2010s in Argentina Category:2018 in South America
title: 2018 Summer Youth Olympics
